returns.lockedUntilEpoch: The epoch until which this tip stream is locked

returns._0: An array of all TipStream structs

params.recipient: The address of the tip stream recipient

returns._0: TipStream struct with the recipient's tip stream details

returns.total: The total allocation as a Percentage

params.recipient: The address of the tip stream recipient to remove

shake(address).details: Redeems shares, distributes assets to recipients, and sends remaining to treasury

params.fleetCommander: The FleetCommander contract to distribute tips from

shakeMultiple(address[]).details: Calls shake() for each FleetCommander in the array

params.fleetCommanders: An array of FleetCommander contracts to distribute tips from

params.shakeAllFleetCommanders: If true, performs a global shake of all fleet commanders before updating

getTipStream(address).notice: Retrieves a specific tip stream's information

getTotalAllocation().notice: Calculates the total allocation percentage across all tip streams

pause().notice: Pauses the TipJar, preventing shake operations

shake(address).notice: Distributes accumulated tips from a single FleetCommander

shakeMultiple(address[]).notice: Distributes accumulated tips from multiple FleetCommanders

unpause().notice: Unpauses the TipJar, allowing shake operations
